column7: this is my first review. Consistency - anytime you visit from the time they open til the last hour of the day
column8: you'll get the same quality and fresh off the smoker cue. Cut - each portion is equal and each cut is even never leading you to think you've been shortchanged. Quality - always premium barbeque
